item.title: Putin doubles down on demands for Ukrainian territory ahead of talks with US in Moscow
item.description: The Russian president accuses Kyiv of wanting to fight "to the last Ukrainian" - which he says Russia is also "in principle" ready to do.

item.title: Palestinian-US teen freed after nine months in Israeli jail
item.description: Mohammed Ibrahim, now 16, was on holiday from Florida when he was arrested for allegedly throwing rocks at Jewish settlers in the occupied West Bank.

item.title: What we know about the Hong Kong apartment fires
item.description: The death toll continues to rise and hundreds are missing, as firefighters struggle to put out the fire.

item.title: Firefighters search for hundreds still missing in devastating Hong Kong tower blocks fire
item.description: Dozens of people have died and hundreds remain unaccounted for after Wednesday's blaze.

item.title: General named new Guinea-Bissau leader a day after coup
item.description: Gen Horta Nâ€™Tam is sworn in during a ceremony at the army headquarters.
